titlestmt.titleproper: Records of the Finance and Private Sector Development Vice Presidency

did.unittitle: Records of the Finance and Private Sector Development Vice Presidency

origination.corpname: Finance and Private Sector Development Vice Presidency

scopecontent.p: The fonds consists of budget, work program, planning, management, and organization records related to FPD and its subordinate departments of PSD, FSD, and IEN.

acqinfo.p: Records were transferred to the World Bank Group Archives using approved records retention and disposition schedules assigned to FPDVP or a Bank-wide schedule for common records.

relatedmaterial.p:
* Records of Financial Sector Development Sector ([WB IBRD/IDA WB_IBRD/IDA_99](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/records-of-financial-sector-development-sector)).
* Records of Private Sector Development Sector ([WB IBRD/IDA WB_IBRD/IDA_100](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/records-of-private-sector-development-sector)).
* Records of the Energy Sector ([WB IBRD/IDA ENGY](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/records-of-energy-development-sector)).
* Records of the Industry and Mining Sector ([WB IBRD/IDA IND])(https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/records-of-industry-development-sector)).
* Records of the Finance, Private Sector Development, and Infrastructure Network ([WB IBRD/IDA WB_IBRD/IDA_103](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/records-of-finance-private-sector-development-and-infrastructure-network)).
* Records of the Private Sector Development Vice Presidency ([WB IBRD/IDA WB_IBRD/IDA_108](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/records-of-private-sector-development-vice-presidency)).
* Records of the Private Sector Development and Infrastructure Vice Presidency ([WB IBRD/IDA WB_IBRD/IDA_107](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/records-of-private-sector-development-and-infrastructure-vice-presidency)).
* Records of the Sector Policy and Research Vice Presidency (PREVP) and the Sector and Operations Policy Vice Presidency (OSPVP) ([WB IBRD/IDA WB_IBRD/IDA_93](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/records-of-sector-policy-and-research-vice-presidency-prevp-and-sector-and-operations-policy-vice-presidency-ospvp)).
* Records related to the Resource Mobilization ([WB IBRD/IDA CFOP](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/resource-mobilization)).
* For records of FPD Vice President Jean-Francois Rischard, see Records of Individual Staff Members - Jean-Francois Rischard files - Vice President, Finance and Private Sector Development Vice Presidency (FPD) chronological files ([WB IBRD/IDA STAFF-28-04](https://archivesholdings.worldbank.org/vice-president-finance-and-private-sector-development-vice-presidency-fpd-chronological-correspondence-files)).
* See oral history of former FPD and FPSI Vice President [Jean-Francois Rischard](http://oralhistory.worldbank.org/person/rischard-jean-francois).

accessrestrict.p: Records are subject to the World Bank Policy on Access to Information.

userestrict.p: Records are subject to the Copyright Policy of the World Bank Group.

did.unittitle: FPD budget, business plan, and work program records

scopecontent.p: The series includes budget, business plan, and work program records. The bulk of the records are Private Sector Development Department (PSD) budget records detailing funding for PSD related units for fiscal year 1996. The budget records include: correspondence; memoranda; trust fund letters of representation; budget reports and charts; and travel expense reports. Budget records related to PSD resource mobilization and funding units of the Private Sector Financial Operations Group (CFSPS) and its successor the Private Sector Development and Privatization Group (PSDPS) are also included for the fiscal year 1996. Budget and work program records for FPD involvement with the Consultative Group to Assist the Poor (CGAP) program are included for fiscal years 1995 and 1996. CGAP records include: correspondence; memoranda; budget reports and charts; progress reports; staff and consultant hiring records; and travel expense reports. Records related to the overall planning, management, and organization of FPD and its subordinate departments are also included for fiscal years 1994 to 1996. These records include: correspondence and memoranda between FPD Vice President Jean Francois Rischard and the directors and staff from each department; quarterly, mid-year, and retrospective review reports; staff lists; trust fund budget reports; FPD themes and prospects reports; business plans; and work programs.

accessrestrict.p: Records are subject to the World Bank Policy on Access to Information.

userestrict.p: Records are subject to the Copyright Policy of the World Bank Group.
